Intercept(MethodInfo, EMethodPatchFlag, EPatchBehaviour)

Creates a MethodAccess and patches in a prefix that relays all calls to InvokeOnBeforeCallHandler(Object, Object[]).

Declaration
public MethodPatch Intercept(MethodInfo method, EMethodPatchFlag eFlags = EMethodPatchFlag.None, EPatchBehaviour eBehaviour = EPatchBehaviour.NeverCallOriginal)

this

If the method is not declared in class m_Declaring

InterceptGeneric(String, Type[], EMethodPatchFlag, EPatchBehaviour, BindingFlags)

Do not use, generics cannot be reliably patched as of right now. See https://github.com/pardeike/Harmony/issues/320

Declaration
[Obsolete]
